.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CheckBoxList extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl implements class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer, class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser

summary.span: 创建多选复选框组，该复选框组可以通过将控件绑定到数据源动态创建。

span.span: Creates a multi selection check box group that can be dynamically created by binding the control to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#Introduction) - [指定列表布局Specifying List Layout](#SpecifyingListLayout) - [指定列表项Specifying List Items](#SpecifyingListItems) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件提供了可以使用数据绑定动态生成多选复选框组组。The control provides a multi selection check box group that can be dynamically generated with data binding. 它包含与列表中的各项相对应的成员的集合。It contains an collection with members corresponding to individual items in the list. 若要确定选中了哪些项，循环访问集合并测试的列表中每个项的属性。To determine which items are checked, iterate through the collection and test the property of each item in the list. > [!NOTE] > 你还可以使用多个控件。You can also use multiple controls. 控件是便于创建一组的复选框使用数据绑定，而各个控件为你提供了更好地控制布局。The control is easier for creating a set of check boxes using data binding, while the individual control gives you greater control over layout. ## 指定列表布局Specifying List Layout 你可以指定列表的方式通过使用显示和属性。You can specify the way the list is displayed by using the and properties. 有关布局选项的信息，请参阅枚举。For information about layout options, see the enumeration. 默认情况下， 设置为 `RepeatDirection.Vertical`。By default, is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`. 此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`水平呈现列表。Setting this property to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` renders the list horizontally. 某些设置不允许水平布局。Some settings do not allow horizontal layout. 有关详细信息，请参见 枚举。For more information, see the enumeration. ## 指定列表项Specifying List Items 若要指定要在中显示的项控制，请将放`ListItem`元素开始标记和结束标记之间的每个条目控件。To specify items that you want to appear in the control, place a `ListItem` element for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the control. 控件还支持数据绑定。The control also supports data binding. 若要将控件绑定到数据源，请先创建的数据源，如之一对象，它包含用于显示控件中的项。To bind the control to a data source, first create a data source, such as one of the objects, that contains the items to display in the control. 接下来，使用方法来绑定到数据源控件。Next, use the method to bind the data source to the control. 使用和属性以指定要绑定到数据源中哪个字段`Text`和`Value`的每个列表的属性在控件中，分别项目。Use the and properties to specify which field in the data source to bind to the `Text` and `Value` properties of each list item in the control, respectively. 控件现在将显示数据源的信息。The control will now display the information from the data source. 若要确定中的选定的项控件，循环访问集合并测试集合中每个项目的属性。To determine the selected items in the control, iterate through the collection and test the property of each item in the collection. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples Visual Studio Web 站点项目与源代码是可用本主题可以附带：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191890)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191890). 下面的代码示例演示如何创建在网页上的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control on a Web page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxList#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxList/CS/checkboxlistcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxList#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxList/VB/checkboxlistvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置单元格的边框和内容之间的距离(以像素为单位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance (in pixels) between the border and contents of the cell.

value.span: 单元格的边框和内容之间的距离(以像素为单位)。

span.span: The distance (in pixels) between the border and contents of the cell.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is -1, which indicates this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来控制单元格的内容和中的单元格的边框之间的间距控件。Use this property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border in the control. 指定的填充量添加到具有最高的单元格的高度和宽度中最宽的单元格的单元格的所有四个边控件。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell with the height of the tallest cell and width of the widest cell in the control. 最终的单元格大小统一应用于中的所有单元格控件。The resulting cell size is applied uniformly to all cells in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的单元格边距为控件为 5 个像素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the cell padding for the control is 5 pixels. > [!NOTE] > 以下代码示例使用单文件代码模式，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 每个代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxListCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxListCellPadding/CS/checkboxlistcellpaddingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxListCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxListCellPadding/VB/checkboxlistcellpaddingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来控制各个单元格之间的间距控件。Use this property to control the spacing between individual cells in the control. 在垂直方向和水平应用此属性。This property is applied both vertically and horizontally. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的单元格间距控件为 5 个像素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the cell spacing for the control is 5 pixels. > [!NOTE] > 以下代码示例使用单文件代码模式，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 每个代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自类。The method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 样式属性控件适用于由控件包含的所有列表项。The style attribute for the control applies to all list items that are contained by the control. 使用属性要检查或设置用于控件以及其列表项的样式特性。Use the property of the to examine or set the style attribute for the control and its list items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自类。The method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 方法指示是否的状态控制已更改。The method indicates whether the state of the control has changed. 换而言之，它确定是否在控件中的每个列表项具有相同上次发布的值的值。In other words, it determines whether each list item in the control has the same value as the last posted value. 用户选中或清除控制更改中的项相应的属性值对象在集合控件。A user selecting or clearing an item in the control changes the property value for the corresponding object in the collection of the control. 如果在控件中，选择了相同的列表项，或者如果处于禁用状态，返回`false`。If the same list items are selected in the control, or if the is disabled, returns `false`. 当方法返回`true`用于控件，页面框架调用控件的方法。When the method returns `true` for a control, the page framework invokes the method for the control.

summary.span: 在客户端上呈现 控件之前对该控件进行配置。

span.span: Configures the control prior to rendering on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自类。The method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 方法允许派生的类来处理事件而不必附加委托。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 方法执行之前保存视图状态和呈现内容的任何必要预呈现步骤。The method performs any necessary prerendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content for the . 中包含的各列表项控件初始化为使用当前的呈现， ，和值。The individual list items contained in the control are initialized for rendering using the current , , and values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便它始终返回的新实例类。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always returns a new instance of the class for the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCheckBoxListOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCheckBoxListOnPreRender/CS/custom_checkboxlist_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCheckBoxListOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCheckBoxListOnPreRender/VB/custom_checkboxlist_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCheckBoxListOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCheckBoxListOnPreRender/CS/custom_checkboxlist_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCheckBoxListOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCheckBoxListOnPreRender/VB/custom_checkboxlist_onprerender.vb#2)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

Protected Overridable Sub RaisePostDataChangedEvent ()
protected: virtual void RaisePostDataChangedEvent();

summary.span: 通知 ASP.NET 应用程序 控件的状态已更改。

span.span: Notifies the ASP.NET application that the state of the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自类。The method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 页面框架调用方法控制方法指示列表项的状态已更改在控件。The page framework calls the method on a control when the method indicates that the state of the list items have changed in the control. 方法调用方法来引发事件。The method calls the method to raise the event. 控件开发人员可以重写方法以执行自定义处理，当用户选择或清除列表控件中的项。Control developers can override the method to perform custom processing when the user selects or clears list items in the control. 方法还可以选择执行之前引发验证控件事件。The method can optionally perform validation before raising the event for the control. 若要验证的一组中的列表项时页上的控件选择时，设置和属性设置为`true`，，指定要在验证控件的组属性。To validate a group of controls on the page when a list item within the is selected, set the and properties to `true`, and specify the group of controls to validate in the property.

summary.span: 在客户端上显示 。

span.span: Displays the on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自类。The method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 实现控制初始化对象列表中，并调用方法，反过来使用方法呈现单个复选框列表项。The implementation for a control initializes a object for the list, and calls the method, which in turn uses the method to render individual check box list items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便始终显示图像。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the always displays an image. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCheckBoxListRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCheckBoxListRender/CS/custom_checkboxlist_rendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCheckBoxListRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCheckBoxListRender/VB/custom_checkboxlist_rendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCheckBoxListRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCheckBoxListRender/CS/custom_checkboxlist_render.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCheckBoxListRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCheckBoxListRender/VB/custom_checkboxlist_render.vb#2)]

summary.span: 呈现 控件中的列表项。

span.span: Renders a list item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自类。This method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 实现控制调用方法，反过来使用方法来呈现列表项的各个复选框。The implementation for a control calls the method, which in turn uses the method to render individual checkbox list items. 方法控件将忽略`itemType`和`repeatInfo`参数。The method for a control ignores the `itemType` and `repeatInfo` parameters. `repeatIndex`值用于选择中的复选框列表项集合，并且选择的列表项呈现到输出流。The `repeatIndex` value is used to select the checkbox list item in the collection, and the selected list item is rendered to the output stream.

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 控件中显示的列数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of columns to display in the control.

value.span: 要在 控件中显示的列数。

span.span: The number of columns to display in the control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为，你可以使用此属性指定在中显示的列数控件。When the property is set to , you can use this property to specify the number of columns that display in the control. 如果未设置此属性，控件单个列中显示所有列表项。If this property is not set, the control displays all list items in a single column. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定两个列会显示在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that two columns are displayed in the control. > [!NOTE] > 以下代码示例使用单文件代码模式，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 每个代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). span.span: The number of columns is set to a negative value.

summary.span: 获取或设置指示控件是垂直显示还是水平显示的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control displays vertically or horizontally.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性指定的显示方向控件。Use this property to specify the display direction of the control. > [!NOTE] > 显示的列数始终由属性。The number of columns that are displayed is always determined by the property. 如果此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Vertical`如果属性设置为，第一列填充从上到下，然后下一列，依次类推直到呈现出所有项。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical` and if the property is set to , the first column is filled from top to bottom, then the next column, and so on until all items are rendered. 例如，如果属性设置为`3`中的项控件显示三个列，如下所示下表中。For example, if the property is set to `3`, the items in the control are displayed in three columns, as in the following table. |||| |-|-|-| |11|44|77| |22|55|88| |33|66|99| 如果此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`如果属性设置为，第一列填充从上到下，然后下一列，依次类推直到呈现出所有项。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` and if the property is set to , the first column is filled from top to bottom, then the next column, and so on until all items are rendered. 例如，如果属性设置为`3`的项控件中的三个项，每行显示下表中。For example, if the property is set to `3`, the items of the control are displayed in rows of three items each, as in the following table. |||| |-|-|-| |11|22|33| |44|55|66| |77|88|99| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性指定的显示方向为垂直。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to specify that the display direction is vertical. > [!NOTE] > 以下代码示例使用单文件代码模式，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 每个代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxListRepeatDirection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxListRepeatDirection/CS/checkboxlistrepeatdirectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxListRepeatDirection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxListRepeatDirection/VB/checkboxlistrepeatdirectionvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The specified display direction of the list is not one of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，应使用到发布的处理的数据的方法对象。Typically, you should use the method to process posted data for a object. 方法是显式接口成员的实现。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

summary.span: 获取或设置组中复选框的文本对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the text alignment for the check boxes within the group.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定是否与对应的复选框关联的文本将显示在左侧或右侧的复选框。Use this property to specify whether the text associated with the check boxes appears on the left or right of the check box. 如果此属性设置为`TextAlign.Right`，右侧的复选框会显示的文本。If this property is set to `TextAlign.Right`, the text is displayed to the right of the check box. 如果此属性设置为`TextAlign.Left`，左边的复选框会显示的文本。If this property is set to `TextAlign.Left`, the text is displayed to the left of the check box. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以指定复选框与关联的文本显示在右侧控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the text associated with the check boxes appears on the right side of the control. > [!NOTE] > 以下代码示例使用单文件代码模式，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 每个代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
